name: iauro systems Pvt Ltd
description:
iauro was started with the vision of taking advantage of latest technologies. iauro has an expertise into Mobile, Cloud, BigData and UX/UI. We have delivered projects from single line concepts to final full-fleged business solutions. Having associated with cutting edge technologies, we have extensively worked in the domains like Enterprise, Business, Utility, Hospitality, Education, Geo-location, etc..
Iauro also provides technological partnership for client ideas and takes complete responsibility of end-to-end scalable solution. We are work on latest upcoming domains like IoT, ibeacons, Wearables, Data Analytics.
